Movies: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
Synopsis: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.
You wake day after day to the comfort and security of your home. But how safe is it really?

Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the dormant Jason Voorhees returns to the camp grounds when he is accidentally released from his prison by a telekinetic teenager.

A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.

Plot undisclosed.

Synopsis: A scientist with the ability to enter the subconscious minds of the possessed must save a young boy from the grips of a demon with powers never seen before, while facing the horrors of his past.

A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

Truly amazing, fantastical, funny, and odd, and sometimes scary, sad, and endearing stories are portrayed. Many famous actors, actresses, and directors made guest appearances.

When a couple of American young adults fly to Israel to visit the city of Jerusalem, a biblical nightmare falls upon the city

When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

and

Modern 4 hour mini-series adaptation of the classic novel by Ira Levin focusing on young Rosemary Woodhouse's suspicions that her neighbors may belong to a Satanic cult who are hell bent on getting one thing: the baby she is carrying.

A TV adaptation of 'The Purge' film series.
A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

This video follows Glover and Jhene Aiko on their vacation, the vibe of the video fits the laid back beat merged with Glovers vocals/ryhmes beautifully. Although there is quite the twist ending for this video.

A man receives a mysterious box containing a terrible secret, a creature that will kill everyone else in his family unless he passes it on to someone he loves to continue its never-ending circulation.
This second revival of
(1959) presents tales of suspense, fantasy, science fiction and horror.
A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990's results in a very violent outcome.
One year after the events of
(1988), the Shape returns to Haddonfield once again in an attempt to kill his now-mute niece.
The Davies expect a baby, which turns out to be a monster with a nasty habit of killing when it's scared. And it's easily scared.
A liquor store owner sells alcoholic beverages to homeless people, unaware of what the bottles actually contain: toxic brew.
A dangerous blizzard hits an isolated town and brings along a mysterious stranger intent on terrorizing people for his own desires.
In a sunken castle underneath the earth, five strangers wake. They have no food. No memory. No water. And no way out. They must organize and band together for the sinister adventure that awaits.
A chemical accident turns ordinary donuts into blood thirsty killers. Now it's up to Johnny, Michelle and Howard to save their sleepy town from...Killer Donuts.
A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.
An American official realizes that his young son may literally be the Devil incarnate.
Eight teenagers are trapped after hours in a high-tech shopping mall and pursued by three murderous security robots out of control.
The story of a woman who is slowly losing her sight whilst trying to investigate the mysterious death of her twin sister.
After being hypnotized by his sister in law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

After being betrayed and murdered by his employer, a government trained assassin named, Al Simmons, is resurrected as a Hellspawn and is forced to become the reluctant leader of Hell's army.

A young woman teams up with an adventurer to find her missing sister in the jungles of New Guinea and they stumble upon a religious cult led by a deranged preacher whom has located his commune in an area inhabited by cannibals.
A group of college students travel to a mysterious island to attend a rave, which is soon taken over by bloodthirsty zombies.
A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.
A tale of a dystopian future where an unknown alien group have colonised the earth and humans struggle to fight back.

An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.
In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.
A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.
When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.
A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight year-old daughter is a heartless killer.

Synopsis: A detached university student faces the consequences of astral projection when he uses it to reconnect with his dead mother.

A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.
Plot unknown. Feature film based on one of Universal Pictures' classic monster characters.

A social misfit uses his only friends, his pet rats, to exact revenge on his tormentors.
A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

When a young man becomes the target of a malevolent entity, he must uncover its true intentions before it takes complete control of him.

short stories.

A professor frantically searches for his son who was abducted during a Halloween parade.

Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf and mute teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behavior of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.

A husband finds out that his wife and her lover are trying to kill him.

An unseen force is manipulating society's most innocent-our children-to act in favor of its cause. As the kids unwittingly help this unknown enemy, the clock counts down in this suspenseful race to save humanity.

While staying at a run-down cabin in the woods during the weekend, three children must save their parents from the neighbor who intends to feed them to her un-dead family.

When one of the teens is captured, those who remain - a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago - band together to survive against the brutal killer.

Facing difficult times and with their glory days long gone, the eight undisputed British vampire overlords gather up for their semi-centennial meeting. However, before the break of dawn, there will be blood. And corpses. Lots of them.

Synopsis: A man wakes up in the wilderness, in a pit full of dead bodies, with no memory and must determine if the murderer is one of the strangers who rescued him, or if he himself is the killer.

Using a special camera that can see spirits, a family must protect their daughter from an evil entity with a sinister plan.
After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

, taking place in both the past and the present.

(1922) is hampered by the fact that its star

"Deep in the ice of the antarctic, a team of geologists uncover an old nazi laboratory still intact where dark experiments had occured. In order to conquer the world, the Nazis created ...

. It follows the adventures of Mildred Hubble, (
) a witch attending Cackles Academy...

in four different roles playing tormented women.
